attributes.action: Restrict all tax code reliefs to 20%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The personal tax allowance (currently £6475) equates to £1295 for a standard rate tax payer, however, for a higher rate tax payer it equates to £2595. It is fundamentally wrong that those who pay tax at a higher rate should receive a higher amount of tax relief
